mapper.insert: insert into orders(number, status, user_id, address_book_id, remark, phone, address, consignee, pay_method, pay_status, amount, order_time, estimated_delivery_time, checkout_time, delivery_status, pack_amount, tableware_number,tableware_status) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{consignee}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{orderTime}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})
